data.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://github.com/") {
body{font-family:-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif,Apple Color Emoji,"Montseratt Medium",Segoe UI Emoji,Noto Color Emoji;color:#fff;background-color:#292d3e}.Header{background-color:#252937}.dashboard-sidebar{background-color:#292d3e}a{color:#63a7f8}.rule,hr{border-bottom-color:#404454}kbd{color:#fff;background-color:#292d3e;border-color:#3f4353;box-shadow:none}.header-nav-current-user .user-profile-link{color:#fff}.jump-to-suggestions-results-container .navigation-item{border-bottom-color:#e1e4e8}.border{border-color:#3f4353!important}.border-top{border-top-color:#404454!important}.border-bottom{border-bottom-color:#404454!important}.border-right{border-right:1px solid #404454!important}.border-lg-left{border-left:1px solid #404454!important}.border-blue{border-color:#1d80f3!important}.border-gray-light{border-color:#404454!important}.border-gray-dark{border-color:#3f4353!important}.bg-white{background-color:#292d3e!important}.text-gray{color:#bbbdc4!important}.text-gray-dark{color:#d5dadf!important}.text-gray-light{color:#969ca4!important}.text-green{color:#30b84f!important}.text-red{color:#ff5764!important}.bg-gray{background-color:#292d3e!important}.link-gray-dark{color:#fff!important}.link-gray-dark:hover,.link-hover-blue:hover{color:#9bacf4!important}.link-gray{color:#cfcece!important}.link-gray:hover,.muted-link:hover{color:#fceded!important}.muted-link{color:#b6b9c7!important}.AvatarStack-body{background:transparent}.AvatarStack--right .avatar{border-color:#ffffff8c}.AvatarStack-body .avatar{background-color:#fefefe38}.Box{background-color:#272a3a;border-color:hsl(228,14%,29%)}.Box-header{background-color:#252937;border-color:#404454}.Box-body{border-bottom-color:#404454}.Box-row{border-top-color:#3f4353}.Box-row--blue{background-color:#252937}.Box-row--hover-blue:hover{background-color:#252937}.Box-row--focus-gray.navigation-focus{background-color:#252937!important}.news div.message,.news li blockquote{color:#d1d1d1}.btn{color:#f1f1f1;background-color:#272a3a;border-color:#404454;background-image:none}.btn.hover,.btn:hover{background-color:#404454;background-image:none;background-position:-.5em;border-color:#404454}.btn-primary{color:#fff;background-color:#2585f5;background-image:none;border-color:#0b77f6}.btn-primary.hover,.btn-primary:hover{background-color:#2585f5;background-image:none}.btn-primary.selected,.btn-primary:active,.btn-primary[aria-selected=true],[open]>.btn-primary{background-color:#2067ba;background-image:none;border-color:transparent;box-shadow:none}.btn-primary.focus,.btn-primary:focus{box-shadow:none}.btn.selected,.btn:active,.btn[aria-selected=true],[open]>.btn{background-color:#383b49;background-image:none;border-color:#404454;box-shadow:none}.btn-link{color:#5fa7f1}.markdown-body img{background-color:transparent}.markdown-body h1,.markdown-body h2{border-bottom-color:#404454}.markdown-body .highlight pre,.markdown-body pre{background-color:#292d3e}.SelectMenu-modal{background-color:#252937;border-color:#404454;box-shadow:0 1px 5px #f6f8fa3d}.SelectMenu-list{border-top-color:#252937;background-color:#292d3e}.SelectMenu-item{background-color:#292d3e;border-bottom-color:#404454;color:#ccc}.SelectMenu-item[aria-checked=true]{color:#31c9dd}.SelectMenu-item:hover,body:not(.intent-mouse) .SelectMenu-item:focus{background-color:#252937}.SelectMenu-filter{border-top-color:#404454}.SelectMenu-tab{border-color:#292d3e}.SelectMenu-tab[aria-selected=true]{color:#f1f8ff;background-color:#292d3e;border-color:#404454}.SelectMenu-tab:not([aria-checked=true]):active,.SelectMenu-tab:not([aria-checked=true]):hover{background-color:#292d3e}.SelectMenu-tab:not([aria-selected=true]):hover{color:#f1f8ff}.SelectMenu-footer{border-top-color:#404454}.SelectMenu-divider{color:#fff;background-color:#252937;border-bottom-color:#404454}.select-menu-modal{background-color:transparent;border-color:#404454}.select-menu-divider,.select-menu-header{background:#252937;border-bottom-color:#404454}.select-menu-divider,.select-menu-header .select-menu-title{color:#fff}.select-menu-item{color:#99cfdf;background-color:#292d3e;border-bottom-color:#404454}.select-menu-item,.select-menu-item-text .description,details-menu .select-menu-item[aria-checked=true] .description,details-menu .select-menu-item[aria-selected=true] .description{color:#b2b4bc}.select-menu-item:hover solid #404454}.topic-tag-link:hover{background-color:#252937;color:#fff}.overall-summary{border-color:#404454}.numbers-summary li>.nolink,.numbers-summary li>a,.numbers-summary .octicon{color:#b2b4bc}.numbers-summary li>a:hover{color:#63a7f8}.repository-lang-stats-graph{border-color:#404454}.file-navigation .octicon-file-directory{color:#b2b4bc}table.files tr.navigation-focus td,table.files tr[aria-selected=true] td{background-color:#252937}.repository-lang-stats-graph .language-color:not(:first-child){border-left-color:#292d3e}.text-emphasized{color:#d4d6e1}code,pre,tt{font-family:monospace}.form-control,.form-select{background-color:#333747;border-color:#ffffff0f;color:#bcf8ff}.form-control.focus,.form-control:focus,.form-select.focus,.form-select:focus{border-color:#2e8bf6;outline:none;box-shadow:none}.input-contrast:focus{background-color:#43454d75}.dropdown-menu{background-color:#292d3e;border-color:#3f4353}.dropdown-menu:before{border:8px solid transparent;border-bottom-color:#3f4353}.dropdown-menu:after{border-bottom-color:#292d3e}.dropdown-item{color:#fff}.dropdown-divider{border-top-color:#3f4353}.Popover-message--bottom-left:after,.Popover-message--bottom-right:after,.Popover-message--bottom:after{border-top-color:#272a3a}.Popover-message--top-left:after{border-bottom-color:#272a3a}.Popover-message--top-left:before{border-bottom-color:#404454}.Popover-message--bottom-left:after{border-top-color:#272a3a}.Popover-message--bottom-left:before{border-top-color:#404454}.pagehead,.page-responsive .pagehead{background-color:#252937!important;border-bottom-color:#404454}.reponav-item{color:#b2b4bc}.reponav-item .Counter{color:#fff}.reponav-item:focus,.reponav-item:hover{color:#fff}.reponav-item.selected{color:#fff;background-color:#292d3e;border-color:#1d80f3 #404454 transparent}.reponav-item .octicon{color:#b2b4bc}.subnav-search-context .btn{color:#b2b4bc}.subnav-item{color:#b2b4bc;border-color:#404454}.subnav-item:focus,.subnav-item:hover{background-color:#252937}.commit-tease{background-color:#252937;border-color:#404454;color:#b2b4bc}.AvatarStack-body .avatar{background-color:#252937}.commit-desc pre{color:#dfe2e5}.commit-tease-sha{font-family:monospace;color:#5aa6ff}.commit-group-title{color:#b2b4bc}.commit-group-title .octicon-git-commit{background-color:#292d3e}.commits-listing:before{background-color:#b0b4ba}.commit .commit-title,.commit .commit-title a{color:#bfc1c9}.commits-list-item .commit-meta{color:#8f919a}.commits-list-item .commit-author{color:#b0b4ba}.commits-list-item.navigation-focus,.commits-list-item[aria-selected=true]{background-color:#252937}.commits-list-item .commit-desc pre{color:#b2b4bc}.signed-commit-badge{border-color:#42ba60}.signed-commit-badge.verified{color:#30b450}.table-list-bordered{border-bottom-color:#404454}.table-list-bordered .table-list-cell:first-child{border-left-color:#404454}.table-list-bordered .table-list-cell:last-child{border-right-color:#404454}.table-list-cell{border-top-color:#404454}.table-list-header-toggle .btn-link.selected,.table-list-header-toggle .btn-link.selected:hover{color:#a8aab2}.table-list-header-toggle .btn-link{color:#9fa2ab}.table-list-header-toggle .btn-link:hover{color:#fff}.social-count{color:#fff;background-color:#404454;border-color:#404454}.social-count:hover{color:#81b7fc}.ellipsis-expander,.hidden-text-expander a{color:#b2b4bc;background-color:#252937;border:1px solid}.ellipsis-expander:hover,.hidden-text-expander a:hover{background-color:#404454}.timeline-comment--caret:before{border-right-color:#404454}.team-mention,.user-mention{color:#fff}.branch-name{color:#fff!important;background-color:#2585f5}.ajax-pagination-form .ajax-pagination-btn{color:#5ba7ec;background:#272a3a;border-color:#404454}.ajax-pagination-form .ajax-pagination-btn:focus,.ajax-pagination-form .ajax-pagination-btn:hover{color:#f1f1f1;background-color:#404454}.pl-c1,.pl-s .pl-v{color:#238aff}.pl-pds,.pl-s,.pl-s .pl-pse .pl-s1,.pl-sr,.pl-sr .pl-cce,.pl-sr .pl-sra,.pl-sr .pl-sre{color:#7fb8fa}.pl-k{color:#f24555}.pl-s .pl-s1,.pl-smi{color:#b6b9c7}.vcard-detail .octicon{color:#bbbdc4}.vcard-username{color:#b6b9c7}.user-profile-nav{background-color:#272a3a;border-bottom-color:#404454}.user-profile-sticky-bar:after{background-color:#272a3a;border-bottom-color:#404454}.UnderlineNav-item.selected,.UnderlineNav-item[aria-current],.UnderlineNav-item[role=tab][aria-selected=true]{color:#fff;border-bottom-color:#2585f5}.UnderlineNav-item{color:#b6b9c7}.UnderlineNav-item:focus,.UnderlineNav-item:hover{color:#fff}.calendar-graph text.month,.calendar-graph text.wday{fill:#b6b9c7}.profile-timeline.discussion-timeline:before{background-color:#3f4353}.profile-timeline.discussion-timeline .profile-timeline-month-heading:after{background-color:#3f4353}.profile-rollup-wrapper+.profile-rollup-wrapper{border-top-color:#3f4353}.rollup-summarized{border-top-color:#eaecef}.profile-rollup-summarized+.profile-rollup-summarized{border-top-color:#3f4353}.profile-timeline-card-wrapper{border-top:none;border-bottom:none}.gh-header{background-color:transparent}.gh-header-meta{color:#b2b4bc;border-bottom-color:#404454}.gh-header-number{color:#8f919a}.discussion-item-icon{color:#b6b9c7;background-color:#292d3e;border-color:#b6b9c7}.timeline-comment{color:#f8ffff;background-color:#292d3e;border-color:#404454}.timeline-comment-header{background-color:#252937;color:#586069;border-bottom-color:#404454}.filter-item{color:#b6b9c7}.Label--outline{color:inherit;border-color:#404454}.State--red{background-color:#ff5764}.reaction-sort-item:focus,.reaction-sort-item:hover{background-color:#404454}.closed.octicon,.reverted.octicon{color:#ff5764}.merged.octicon{color:#2585f5}.open.octicon{color:#31c252}.pagination .disabled,.pagination .disabled:hover,.pagination .gap,.pagination .gap:hover,.pagination [aria-disabled=true],.pagination [aria-disabled=true]:hover{background-color:#292d3e}.pagination a,.pagination em,.pagination span{background:#292d3e;border-color:#404454;color:#5f95c2}.current:hover,.pagination [aria-current],.pagination [aria-current]:hover{background-color:#252937;border-color:#404454}.pagination .current,.pagination .current:hover,.pagination [aria-current],.pagination [aria-current]:hover{background-color:#252937;border-color:#404454}.pagination a:focus,.pagination a:hover,.pagination em:focus,.pagination em:hover,.pagination span:focus,.pagination span:hover{background-color:#252937;border-color:#404454;color:#fff}.Box-row--focus-gray.navigation-focus{background-color:#252937}}
